title: Watch Dogs (2014)
description:
Genre: Action-Adventure

Size: 14 GB

Language: English

Platform support: x64 

Release Date: May 27, 2014

Developer(s): Ubisoft Montreal

Operating System: Microsoft Windows


Minimum System Requirements

Processor: Core 2 Quad Q8400 2.66GHz
Phenom II X4 940
Memory: 6 GB RAM
Hard Disk Space: 20 GB
Graphics Card: GeForce GTX 460 768MB 
Radeon HD 5770 1024MB
DirectX: DirectX 11

Recommended System Requirements

Processor: Core i7-3770 4-Core 3.4GHz
FX-8350
Memory: 8 GB RAM
Hard Disk Space: 20 GB
Graphics Card: GeForce GTX 560 Ti
Radeon HD 7850
DirectX: DirectX 11

Installation 

1.Install 'watch_dogs.exe' (Watch Dogs (2014) [G2G.fm]binwatch_dogs.exe).

2.Wait for UPlay to install.

3.While UPlay is on login screen, copy the crack content to the 'bin' folder.

4.Play the game from (Watch Dogs (2014) [G2G.fm]binGameLauncher_x64.exe). Without closing UPlay.

Enjoy!
